DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Adaptor status"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(A, 1, Bool), 1, \u0022Ready\u0022, 0, \u0022Not ready\u0022, DeviceProperties.WriteSwitchState: var reg := MODBUSR(H, 1998 + (DeviceNumber*3), UInt16); MODBUSW(H, 1998 + (DeviceNumber*3), UInt16, SETBITS(reg,4,4, Mu));
var reg :=MODBUSR(H, 1999+(DeviceNumber*3), Int16); MODBUSW(H, 1999+(DeviceNumber*3), Int16, SETBITS(reg, 0, 4, mu))
